articles.title: National Preparatory Committee Formed in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
National Preparatory Committee Formed in Sri Lanka 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of a Sri Lanka national preparatory committee for celebrating the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il was held in Colombo on January 28.
 At the ceremony MP Reggie Ranatunge, chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to organize a meeting, photo exhibition, film show, seminar and other colorful functions to celebrate the birthday of Kim Jong Il on a nation-wide scale and hold a Sri Lanka national seminar on self-reliance on the occasion of his birthday in Colombo on February 15.

Greetings to Iran President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iran President
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a congratulatory message to Seyed Mohammad Khatami, president of the Republic of Iran, on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution in Iran.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries that have favorably developed since the victory would further develop in various fields, the message said:    
 I take this opportunity to wish you greater success in your responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country and the Iranian people well-being.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian Senior Officials
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian Senior Officials
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mohammad Reza Aref, first vice-president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the victory in the Islamic Revolution of Iran.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries forged in the common struggle against imperialism will steadily grow stronger, the message wished him success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.    
 Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Iranian counterpart Seyed Kamal Kharrazi.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors' corps here on the occasion of his birthday.
 They were conveyed to an official concerned today by Gu Jinsheng, commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy, on behalf of the corps.

Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Jo Ryong Hyon, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Tuesday to visit the socialist homeland on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 It was met at the airport by Kim Jung Rin, Kim Yu Ho, director of the Bureau of Reception for Overseas Compatriots, and officials concerned.
